mapper.insert: insert into t_beian_changed (creatorId, lastUpdatorId, createTime, lastUpdateTime, msCreatorId, msLastUpdatorId, companyId, beianId, changeLetterDate, changeContent, changeFilePath) values (#{item.creatorId},#{item.lastUpdatorId},#{item.createTime},#{item.lastUpdateTime},#{item.msCreatorId},#{item.msLastUpdatorId}, #{item.companyId},#{item.beianId},#{item.changeLetterDate},#{item.changeContent},#{item.changeFilePath})
